categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Cerik was a Human male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War and later the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3642 BBY, Master Cerik was appointed by the Jedi Council to oversee the Taris Resettlement Initiative. Unfortunately, the Empire tried with all tactics to disturb and stop the project; in the end with the help of an Imperial-aligned individual, the Sith destroyed most of the Republic units stationed on the planet, then a Sith army assaulted the Olaris Reclamation Base, the resettlement headquarters, and in the fighting the Imperial killed Cerik and destroyed the base, securing Taris for the Sith.
